text: SECOND, I give, devise and bequeath unto my spouse, [Person-2] all real property, together with all the rest, residue, and remainder of my estate, real, personal and mixed, of every kind and nature and wheresoever situated, of which I now owned, possessed, including all other community personal property that may hereafter be acquired, or to which I may be entitled at the time of my decease.

texts: all real property, together with all the rest, residue, and remainder of my estate, real, personal and mixed, of every kind and nature and wheresoever situated, of which I now owned, possessed, including all other community personal property that may hereafter be acquired, or to which I may be entitled at the time of my decease
at the time of my decease
